1.title: Your Triabrain
1.plot: Olympia LePoint discovers the Triabrain, the new three-sided brain, and exposes how its faith sector unleashes brain waves that produce scientific innovation, bodily healing and triumphant strength.

2.title: Brain Attraction & the Brain Reshaping-ship
2.plot: Just like Einstein's theory explains that gravitational waves can pierce through all matter, human triabrain waves send out brain-transformational messages, attracting deep relationships for surprising, hidden reasons.

3.title: Voilà - A Pain Free Life
3.plot: A pain free life is at your fingertips.

4.title: Predicting Your Future with Science
4.plot: Is it possible to predict the future, much less, predict your own future? After all, you may have more than one future to foresee.

5.title: Rising Up Through Higher Education
5.plot: Learn the tips to overcome any situation to obtain your higher educational degree.

6.title: Your Power to Attract More
6.plot: With a specific brain method, coupled with understanding the practical laws of attraction, TED Speaker Wendy Yost shows audience members how to let go of the poverty-thinking and attract success.

7.title: Once Devalued, Now Luxury Sold
7.plot: With over multi-millions in estate sales as evidence, Barbra Stover shares her personal story of devalued-thinking to fortune success.

8.title: Prayer, Brainpower and Science Miracles
8.plot: Some scientists are skeptical about the power of prayer in relation to this scientific phenomenon. However, experience is proving otherwise.

9.title: Become an Entrepreneur and Illuminate Your Talents
9.plot: Chad Zdenek shares his personal story and explains how to build an Illumination Tool Box for personal success.

10.title: The Billionaire Formula
10.plot: The billionaire formula is rooted in Innovation, brain reshaping and Albert Einstein's theory of time and hidden tricks very few people know.

11.title: Regaining Mental Peace After Trauma
11.plot: Trauma affects our thoughts, emotions, all five senses, and body movement, which are all functions overseen by the human brain. Trauma can be consciously removed.

imdb.plot outline: Answers Unleashed is a half-hour weekly talk show series and within each episode listeners reshape their brains with science and faith to overcome situations by finding "The Answers" in front of them. The show uniquely combines principles of rocket science, neuroscience, applied mathematics, psychology and the brain's natural faith ability to empower listeners in generating solutions in their lives. Whether it be a person who needs to find a way to pay for college, or a leader who wants to start a business, or a person who desires to transform their physical health, this show explains how a person can effectively use their TRIABRAIN - the Left/Right/Faith 3 Brain system discovered by Olympia LePoint - which is the secret key for creating life-changing solutions. Each half-hour weekly show ranges between 3 formats: Olympia's Answer Unleashed - Olympia's "Brain Tip" of the week; "Get to LePoint" Live Callers who gain Olympia's help in using science principles and their pre-existing resources to create solutions; An interview with a "Newest Einstein" who is a triumphant guest or innovator.
imdb.title: Answers Unleashed
plot: _Answers Unleashed_ (qv) is a half-hour weekly talk show series in which listeners reshape their brains with science and faith to overcome situations by finding "The Answers" in front of them within 30 minutes.::Olympia LePoint

_Answers Unleashed_ (qv) is a half-hour weekly talk show series and within each episode listeners reshape their brains with science and faith to overcome situations by finding "The Answers" in front of them. The show uniquely combines principles of rocket science, neuroscience, applied mathematics, psychology and the brain's natural faith ability to empower listeners in generating solutions in their lives. Whether it be a person who needs to find a way to pay for college, or a leader who wants to start a business, or a person who desires to transform their physical health, this show explains how a person can effectively use their TRIABRAIN - the Left/Right/Faith 3 Brain system discovered by Olympia LePoint - which is the secret key for creating life-changing solutions. Each half-hour weekly show ranges between 3 formats: Olympia's Answer Unleashed - Olympia's "Brain Tip" of the week; "Get to LePoint" Live Callers who gain Olympia's help in using science principles and their pre-existing resources to create solutions; An interview with a "Newest Einstein" who is a triumphant guest or innovator.
